name: text_overlays
rule: Non-diegetic on-screen text (captions, headers, labels, CTAs) must NOT be baked into kie.ai renders. Render clean scenes with kie.ai and add text using Shotstack overlay layers in post.
examples: GOOD: kie.ai renders the object-only scene; Shotstack adds a 'cheeseburger' header overlay.
BAD: kie.ai prompt includes 'text "cheeseburger" on screen', causing baked-in text artifacts.
guidelines: Treat captions, lower-thirds, headers, and calls-to-action as overlays.
Only bake text if it is physically present in-scene (diegetic signage).
Extract overlay copy and timing as structured metadata for Alex to place in Shotstack.
